about.description:
The software foxes is a modular wind farm simulation and wake
modelling toolbox which is based on engineering wake models. It
has many applications, for example wind farm optimization,
wind farm post-construction analysis, wake model studies, and
wind farm simulations invoking complex model chains.
about.summary: Farm Optimization and eXtended yield Evaluation Software

about.description:
The software foxes is a modular wind farm simulation and wake
modelling toolbox which is based on engineering wake models. It
has many applications, for example wind farm optimization,
wind farm post-construction analysis, wake model studies, and
wind farm simulations invoking complex model chains.
about.summary: Farm Optimization and eXtended yield Evaluation Software

name: foxes
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "foxes" %}
{% set version = "0.3.4" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/FraunhoferIWES/foxes/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: eb1d39857e6d02702607346f9d2b63eb9c3a3766740c52bafca97c13ba51563f

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.7
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3.7
    - matplotlib-base
    - numpy
    - xarray
    - dask-core
    - distributed
    - scipy
    - plotly
    - autovizwidget
    - iwopy
    - pymoo >=0.6
    - python-kaleido
    - netcdf4

test:
  imports:
    - foxes
  requires:
    - pip
    - pytest
  source_files:
    - tests
  commands:
    - pip check
    - pytest tests

about:
  home: https://github.com/FraunhoferIWES/foxes
  summary: Farm Optimization and eXtended yield Evaluation Software
  description: |
    The software foxes is a modular wind farm simulation and wake
    modelling toolbox which is based on engineering wake models. It
    has many applications, for example wind farm optimization,
    wind farm post-construction analysis, wake model studies, and
    wind farm simulations invoking complex model chains.
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - SchmJo
